Contact Us

Make your institution's donation process easy and efficient
For Donors:
Donation Resume makes donating your items easier than ever with one well-formatted resume to send to institutions around the world. If you have any questions or suggestions for how we can make our tools even more accessible, let us know!

For Institutions:
No matter the size of your institution, Donation Resume can work for you. Our tools are easy to incorporate into your website and donation process. Make a commitment to collection diversity and amplify your story today.
